wikipedia_page.main: Major General Sir Henry Desmond Allen Langley,  (16 May 1930 – 14 February 2008) was a senior British Army officer who served as Major-General commanding the Household Division and General Officer Commanding London District from 1979 to 1983. He later served as the 132nd Governor of Bermuda from 1988 to 1992.

response: *Major-General Sir Desmond Langley,  1979–1983 late The Life Guards
